headline: Assessing Eastman Chemical (EMN) Valuation As Cost Cuts AI Efficiencies And Recycling Technology Target Earnings Rebound
summary: Eastman Chemical (EMN) is back on investors’ radar after fresh analysis spotlighted its plan for $175 million in structural cost cuts, AI driven efficiency efforts, and a growing focus on Molecular Recycling Technology. See our latest analysis for Eastman Chemical. That cost cutting story is arriving after a mixed run in the stock, with a 90 day share price return of 8.15% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 26.63%, which suggests some recent momentum but a longer term drag as...
